from* to end of round 3 sts decreased 184 sts for xl size only next round k2 * k73 m1 repeat from * to end of round 3 sts increased 224 sts all other sizes need not increase nor decrease at this time as of now you have 170 184 204 224 sts on your needle please make sure you place a marker to divide your stitches exactly in half you will have 85 92 102 112 on each side of the markers so now you have a marker that denotes the beginning of the round let s call that the 1st marker and a 2nd marker that denotes the exact halfway point continue in stockinette st in the round which means you knit every round until piece measures 13 13 14 15 measure from the point where you connected in the round note please know that if you work with alexcreates bamboo yarn your piece will grow at least 2 -3 after washing also if you wish for your piece to be a bit longer now is the time to add length keep in mind that adding length will affect your use of yardage step 3 shaping armhole and dividing for front and back you have 170 184 204 224 on the needles you are ready to shape the armholes previously you made sure you placed a marker to divide your stitches exactly in half you have 85 92 102 112 on each side of the markers so you have a marker that denotes the beginning of the round let s call that the 1st marker and a 2nd marker that denotes the exact halfway point next round k to 5 6 6 7 sts before 1st marker bobble 10 12 12 14 sts for armhole and take off the marker along the way k to 5 6 6 7 sts before 2nd marker and bobble 10 12 12 14 sts for second armhole and take off the marker along the way continue to k across until you hit the first armhole and you cannot knit any further copyright 2018 nancy ricci all rights reserved this pattern may not be reproduced or used for resale
